introduction: This program focuses on user interface design and software engineering, with a specific emphasis on integrating data and visualization. It covers a wide range of topics, including web development, interaction design, mobile application development, and multimedia technology. The program is funded by the human capital initiative and aims to prepare graduates for careers in fields such as UX/UI design, human factors engineering, and information architecture. The skill set developed in the program allows for flexibility and the ability to work in various areas of software development and technology.

sections.title: Section 1: Introduction to User Interface Design and Software Engineering
content: Explanation of the importance of user interfaces in daily life and their role in modern technology.
Overview of the program's focus on user interface design and software engineering.
Discussion of the integration of data and visualization in the program.
Introduction to the wide range of practical subjects covered in the program.

sections.title: Section 2: Web Development and Interaction Design
content: Explanation of web development and its role in modern technology.
Overview of popular web frameworks, programming languages, and tools.
Discussion of interaction design principles and best practices.
Practical examples and projects to reinforce learning.

sections.title: Section 3: Mobile Application Development and Multimedia Technology
content: Explanation of mobile application development and its role in modern technology.
Overview of popular mobile development frameworks, programming languages, and tools.
Discussion of multimedia technology and its applications in user interfaces.
Practical examples and projects to reinforce learning.

sections.title: Section 4: Data Science and Visualization
content: Explanation of data science and its role in modern technology.
Overview of popular data science tools and techniques.
Discussion of data visualization principles and best practices.
Practical examples and projects to reinforce learning.

sections.title: Section 5: Ethical Questions and Collaboration with Philosophy Department
content: Explanation of the importance of ethical considerations in user interface design and software engineering.
Overview of the collaboration with the philosophy department on ethical questions.
Discussion of the impact of technology on society and individual rights.
Practical examples and projects to reinforce learning.
